pages.title: Crafting Guides (JEI)
pages.text: When in your inventory or in a crafting table, there will be a green book button. This opens your JEI Crafting Guide.$(br)JEI can show any crafting recipe and autofill crafting slots if the items are present.$(br2)You can search and bring up recipes used by other crafting type blocks from mods in the block list on the right.
The crafting guide is provided by Just Enough Items (JEI), the ultimate recipe indexing mod.
